## One concluding remark

I encourage you to make part of *your* (professional) mission:

* To improve health by empowering a community to collaboratively generate the evidence that promotes better health decisions and better care

Here is direct impact on my friend, colleague and PhD-mentee Jamie Weaver: [His personal story](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XUyOG_iTLD8)

What are you going doing to do to help patients like Jamie?
